name: Shiraki Meiko (Prison School)
description:
V2 description

Tagged anew from scratch and retrained with a much better result. I kept prompts the same cause that way I can keep description short and that's good cause I'm lazy :D Preview images were made with weight 1.

This version can be a bit more eager to show off naked breasts - if you don't want that, best remedy is to put nipples in negative.

V1 description

Lora model from Shiraki Meiko from Prison School. Worked best for me with weights 0.7-0.8. Since I already made two other girls, I didn't reall had a choice here (˵ ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°˵)

In my recent models I might have overdid with image captioning so I went easier on it here. This means prompt has to be more specific.

The main trigger word is shiraki meiko and keep hair bun, glasses at all times with it.

For the normal outfit use school uniform, black thighhighs, plaid skirt, knee boots, ribbon choker, brown jacket. You can also instead use black bodysuit, unzipped for a different outfit +_+ and for prison clothes use striped, midriff, prison clothes.

modelVersions.description:
Better in most ways.

Sometimes more NSFW (boobs escaping the jacket) - can be fixed with nipples in negative.
